title: Nioxin Cleanser, System 4 (Fine/Treated/Noticeably Thinning), 33.8 Ounce
description: Aqua/Eau/Water, Tealauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide Mea, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Honey, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lauryl Glucoside, Dimethicone Propyl Pgbetaine, Glycol Stearate, Peg150 Distearate, Polyquate

title: Nioxin Cleanser, System 1 (Fine Hair/Normal to Thin-Looking) Shampoo, 33.8 Ounce
description: Nioxin Cleanser is a detoxifying cleanser for fine, thin, non-chemically treated hair Formulated with a concentrated blend of botanicals and humectants, this cleanser removes product build up, minerals, pollutants and toxins, clears nutrient pathways at hair follicle sites without stripping essential oils, and provides an optimum scalp environment Bionutrient Actives Cleanser leaves hair growing healthily with body, volume and shine.

title: Redken Rewind Pliable Styling Paste, 5-Ounces Jar
description: Add a Twist to Your HairstylesHairstyles can enhance your personality, so you need a styler that brings out the natural charm of your hair. With Redken Rewind 06 Styling Paste, you can twist, shape and arrange your hair the way you want for a scintillating effect. Hair remains moist and flexible so that you can style your hair to enhance its beauty and appearance. Create versatile styles with your hair for a wow factor.Twist, shape and style hairStays moist and flexible to rearrange stylesDoesn't weigh hair downUses fiber technology networkThis unique styling paste gives your hair a fuller look without weighing it down. After applying, it stays moist and flexible so that you can rearrange your hairstyles.Just For You:All hair typesA Closer Look:Redken Rewind 06 Styling Paste creates a pliable fiber technology network for optimum support and control so that styles can be rearranged.Get Started:Apply onto damp or wet hair. Use it alone or with other Redken styling products for better results.
